programme.title: Run, Man, Run
programme.desc: Several competing groups and mavericks (including the lead character Cuchillo) are hunting a gold treasure of $3,000,000. The gold was reserved for the Mexican revolution.

programme.title: Crazy Westerners
programme.desc: Little Rita is a female gunslinger who travels to the Far West chasing outlaws. She takes gold from them and hides it in a cave which she plans to blow up one day and get rid of the root of all evil: money.

programme.title: Long Live ... Your Death!
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.

programme.title: Heads or Tails
programme.desc: Shanda is charged with the murder of the banker, Burton and to save her from being lynched, the sheriff sends her off to Phoenix. During the trip the two deputies to whom she’s been entrusted rape and leave her in the desert, certain that she’s dead. The girl is found by Black Talisman, an outlaw, who takes her to his hideout, nurses her back to health and after hearing her story, determines to avenge her and clear her name.

programme.title: Gunman of Ave Maria
programme.desc: Mann is a gunman informed by a childhood friend that his father was murdered years earlier by his mother and her lover.

programme.title: Paid in Blood
programme.desc: Jeff Cameron is Tom Carter and he’s a man on a mission to get revenge for his brother Jerry, who was gunned down after pulling his life savings out of the Rio Canyon town bank.

programme.title: Deadly Trackers
programme.desc: Jeff sets out to murder each one of the five outlaws who robbed, raped and killed his poor sister.

programme.title: Troublemakers
programme.desc: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

programme.title: Day of Anger
programme.desc: Bank robbery pulled off by the bank officials, not the usual James gang.

programme.title: Four Gunmen of the Holy Trinity
programme.desc: Arms trafficking with the Indians on the one hand and acquiring documents concerning the ownership of a goldmine on the other are the principal interests of Quin and Gomez, the highly suspicious guests at Papa Martinez' inn.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: The Sorenson family is massacred, apparently by Indians. On the site of the killing, a town, Gold Hill grows up, run by a group of businessmen.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django is on the trail of some renegade outlaws who raped and killed his wife. En route, he rescues a horse thief from an impromptu hanging. He discovers the man knows who committed the murder. The men team up and head west for revenge.

programme.title: A Coffin from Sartana
programme.desc: After witnessing a brutal massacre, the legendary hero Sartana is ready to do some investigating. Almost everyone in the tiny town of Indian Creek seems eager to buy up the property left behind by the murder victims, ...

programme.title: Fifteen Scaffolds for a Murderer
programme.desc: Accused of a hideous crime they did not commit, the members of two rivaling gangs, persecuted by a bloodthirsty lynch mob, take refuge in an abandoned fort, taking two hostages with them.
